story.description1: Established over 25 years ago, PT. Wang Sarimulti Utama has grown from a dedicated manufacturing operation into a trusted industry leader. We provide precision-focused manufacturing solutions ranging from advanced tooling and plastic injection to a wide range of secondary processes, including painting, printing, laser marking, hot stamping, and sub assembly.
story.description2: Our unwavering commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction has earned us a reputation as a reliable partner for companies seeking consistent, high-standard manufacturing results. Supported by modern facilities and a skilled team with decades of expertise, we continue to refine our capabilities and deliver solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible in plastic manufacturing.
story.visionDesc: To be the most trusted and innovative "One Stop Solution Provider" with impeccable services to customers.
story.missionDesc: To achieve operational excellence and sustainable profitable growth by a workforce filled with a vibrant spirit that strives for perfection.

whyUs.subtitle: Here's why we stand out from the competition

quality.title: Excellent Quality
quality.desc: ISO 9001 certified processes ensure consistent excellence in every product we manufacture.

precision.title: Precision Engineering
precision.desc: Advanced equipment and skilled technicians ensure consistent quality of work.

delivery.title: On-Time Delivery
delivery.desc: 98% on-time delivery rate backed by efficient production planning and logistics management.

certified.title: Certified Excellence
certified.desc: Multiple industry certifications including ISO 9001, IATF 16949, and ISO 14001.

support.title: Expert Support
support.desc: Dedicated project managers and engineering support throughout your entire production lifecycle.

scalable.title: Scalable Solutions
scalable.desc: From prototype to high-volume production, we scale seamlessly to meet your demands.
